Average Financial Analyst Pay vs. Other Best Jobs. The average salary for a financial analyst was $91,620 in 2013, which is slightly less than that of financial advisors ($99,920) and mid-range compared with other occupations on our list of the Best Business Jobs. For example, in 2013, a sales manager made $123,150 and a marketing manager made $133,700.

Data Analyst Salary. (Australia). The average pay for a Data Analyst is AU$66,398 per year. Skills that are associated with high pay for this job are Data Modeling, R, and Statistical Analysis. Most people with this job move on to other positions after 20 years in this career. AU$47,969 - AU$91,679

For example the median expected annual pay for a typical Business Data Analyst I in the United States is $55,487 so 50% of the people who perform the job of Business Data Analyst I in the United States are expected to make less than $55,487. Source: HR Reported data as of October 2015.

Data Analyst Salary. Data Analyst average salary is $58,941, median salary is $57,781 with a salary range from $22,880 to $625,000. Data Analyst salaries are collected from government agencies and companies. Each salary is associated with a real job position. Data Analyst salary statistics is not exclusive and is for reference only.
